title: Pixel 3XL shuts down when screen sleeps, but not when playing audio or plugged in
content:
The phone turns itself off, within seconds of being locked or the screen turning off due to inactivity. It starts up again just fine. This started happening 2 days ago - no trigger event as far as I can tell.

Curiously, it stays on if audio is playing, or if plugged into a PC via USB, but not when plugged into a plain charger. This makes me think it's some particular trigger or event in the system that is causing it to turn off.

Problem persists in safe mode. Have done factory reset & phone is fully updated. Phone has an aftermarket screen replacement which has been working fine until now.

Any ideas before looking at replacement? Thanks.
